name: Genetic Algorithm
description: Create a route network using a genetic algorithm.

inputStageFormats.name: Stops
inputStageFormats.help: The stops between which to make the stop connection graph edges

inputStageFormats.name: Stop connection graph
inputStageFormats.help: Stop connection graph between the stops.

outputStageFormats.name: Route Network
outputStageFormats.help: A route network using links from the stop connection graph.
